title: Sanje Sedera.
description: Learn more about Sanje Sedera, who provides a variety of services to the patients of Las Vegas Integrative Medicine. To book an appointment, please call us at 702-708-2207 or visit our office in Las Vegas, NV.
cleaned_text: Having lived in Las Vegas nearly 30 years, entrepreneur by nature with several successful startups under his belt, in 2013 Sanje was able to co-found Las Vegas Integrative Medicine with his wife Dr. Yoojin Lee-Sedera. As the CEO of Las Vegas Integrative Medicine Sanje is incharge of public affairs and the medical lien program.
